00032 #include <cstring>

00034 AUD_SilenceReader::AUD_SilenceReader() :
00035     m_position(0)
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 bool AUD_SilenceReader::isSeekable() const
00040 {
00041     return true;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void AUD_SilenceReader::seek(int position)
00045 {
00046     m_position = position;
00047 }
00048 
00049 int AUD_SilenceReader::getLength() const
00050 {
00051     return -1;
00052 }
00053 
00054 int AUD_SilenceReader::getPosition() const
00055 {
00056     return m_position;
00057 }
00058 
00059 AUD_Specs AUD_SilenceReader::getSpecs() const
00060 {
00061     AUD_Specs specs;
00062     specs.rate = AUD_RATE_44100;
00063     specs.channels = AUD_CHANNELS_MONO;
00064     return specs;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void AUD_SilenceReader::read(int& length, bool& eos, sample_t* buffer)
00068 {
00069     memset(buffer, 0, length * sizeof(sample_t));
00070     m_position += length;
00071     eos = false;
00072 }
